channel.title: +Water heater on Vishvas's notes
channel.description: Recent content in +Water heater on Vishvas's notes

item.title: Solar water heater
item.description: Law requirements (2020 BLR) 200 lts water heater compulsary for 30x40 site. Panels 2m x 3m = 6.6ft x 9.9 ft, cu fins and pipes for efficiency - 2 panels suffice for 8 people as per Prashant BLR 2020.
